version_description:
We are pleased to announce the new update for Hey Color:

- The long-awaited version is finally here. Hey Color goes global!
- Enjoy coloring 3 new categories: Lifestyle, Kids, Marine. Over 800 free pics. No hidden fees!
- We’ve prepared even more awesome pics. Stay with us!
- We’ve added energy – power, that helps you using hints and other magic tools!
- Meet rewards: after each finished pic you’ll get bonus energy!
- Performance and stability improvements.
- Minor UX enhancements.

Please, leave us some feedback and feel free to suggest us your ideas and concerns. Best to you!

Find your Zen in coloring by numbers!

- Check out the all-new app design. Enjoy even more relaxing coloring experience.
- You asked - we did! The finished color moves to the end of the palette now.
- As always, we have added more awesome pictures.

Love Hey Color? Write a review.
Have a suggestion? Feel free to share your ideas with us.

Find your Zen in coloring by numbers!

- Check out the all-new app design. Enjoy even more relaxing coloring experience.
- You asked - we did! The finished color moves to the end of the palette now.
- As always, we have added more awesome pictures.

Love Hey Color? Write a review.
Have a suggestion? Feel free to share your ideas with us.

Find your Zen in coloring by numbers!

– 7 new images will be added TO THE APP every day. Enjoy more stunning pics daily.
– Love landscapes? Introducing a brand new category for you: Nature.
– We have added more challenging & intricate images!

Love Hey Color? Write a review.
Thank you for being a part of our community. Feel free to share your ideas with us.

We bring you a new version of Hey Color with some enhancements:

- Meet brand new content: stunning pictures with thin lines!
- Manage your pics in My Works (delete or restart)
- Enjoy smooth animations at the start and end of coloring.
- Renewed share & save options.
- Performance and stability improvement.
- Optimized for iOS 13.

Love Hey Color? Write a review!
Thank you for being a part of our community.

We bring you a new version of Hey Color with some enhancements.

– Meet suggestions! Once you’ve done with any picture, the app will pick up the most interesting for you and fascinating art pages.
– We have added even more challenging & intricate color-by-number images!
– Performance and stability improvement.

Love Hey Color? Write a review!
Thank you for being a part of our community.

Ho-ho-ho, Dear HeyColorists! The most wonderful time of the year is coming and so do our updates:

– Say «goodbye» to annoying things - a critical bug has been fixed!
– To make your experience in the app even better, we enhanced Energy and Hints.
– Christmas-themed pictures are on their way! Feel the spirit of the upcoming holidays. Color special winter & Xmas pics every day.

Love Hey Color? Write a review!
Thank you for being a part of our community.

Take a break from pre-holiday fuss! Our pleasant updates are here to comfort you after a long and exhausting day of festive preparations.

– Brand new experience with no lines images - challenge yourself and get a stunning outcome! You will be impressed with smooth and vivid illustrations - they will look just like a painting!
– We have finally squashed the most annoying bug that was guilty of crashing the app. Hooray, peacefulness and calmness are now restored!
– It is our pleasure to cheer you up with even more holiday-themed pictures in daily updates!

We hope these lovely enhancements will find a little place in your heart and keep you relaxed during Christmas preparations. Don’t forget you are always welcome to share your thoughts!

Thank you for staying with us and have a blissful holiday! Merry Christmas!

New year, new version! In this update, we did our best and left annoying bugs in 2019.

It’s time to meet the enhancements:
– Performance and stability improvements for a smoother experience.
– Pleasant content updates!

Have some thoughts and suggestions or simply love Hey Color? Leave a review - we would love to hear you out!

New year, new version! In this update, we did our best and left annoying bugs in 2019.

It’s time to meet the enhancements:
– Performance and stability improvements for a smoother experience.
– Pleasant content updates!

Have some thoughts and suggestions or simply love Hey Color? Leave a review - we would love to hear you out!

Long time no see! We are here to introduce a couple of exciting updates:

– Meet our redesigned Explore Page. With the enhanced preview, the pictures became more visible! Isn’t that amazing?
– Thoughtfully chosen, the best pics are now in our brand new collection - Editors’ Choice. Get ready for stunning events and updates!

Your every review nourishes our growth, and we appreciate it so much. Thank you for staying with us!

Hello there! Cheering you up with a portion of lovely updates:

– Now you can like and dislike pictures in the app!
– We've squashed some nasty bugs.
– Suggested images have a better preview.

Your every review nourishes our growth, and we appreciate it so much. Thank you for staying with us!

Dear Hey Colorists,

You asked, and we’ve made it! Long waited Achievements are coming at you! Yay!
For those who want to spice up their gaming experience, Achievements are just the ticket. Challenge yourself, complete cool tasks, and get awesome rewards.

Your every review nourishes our growth, and we appreciate it so much. Thank you for staying with us!

Meet our spring updates!

-2 additional levels in Achievements. More challenges stand for more fun, right?
-10 new Achievements are waiting for you! Explore and get awesome rewards.

Meet awesome images to help you unwind during difficult times. Stay home & be safe!
-We have squared some nasty bugs. Goodbye, goodbye!
-Daily New rewards. Color Daily New images and get more bonus images.

Your every review nourishes our growth, and we appreciate it so much. Thank you for staying with us!

Say hello to a bulk of nice coloring pages to help you unwind at these hard times. Stay home, be safe if you can, and paint by numbers!
- Farewell to some minor bugs.
- Return regularly to grab your Daily New rewards if you missed it earlier, including bonus images and free boosters.

Your every review nourishes our growth, and we appreciate it so much. Thank you for staying with us!

Hey Color has just got a whole new brand’s look. Come closer and explore it.
Love Magic images? Enjoy them daily on the app now.
As always, we've squashed some nasty bugs. Bye, fellas!

Thanks for your feedback and reviews: this way, you help us evolve and grow!
Got an idea? Drop us a line at support@zephyrmobile.com
Follow our Facebook page and get awesome bonus images: facebook.com/heycolor
